steps.title: Task List
steps.text: The Task List shows all the tasks that you can accomplish.

steps.title: Completing a Task
steps.text: When ready to try a task, click on the speak microphone and say whatever is needed. In this case, try clicking the 'speak button' and greeting her by saying 'Hola'.

steps.title: Completed Tasks
steps.text: Great work! You'll hear and see a response if you're correct, and the tasks will highlight in green and become checked as you complete them.

steps.title: Good luck!
steps.text: See if you can complete all the tasks for the character and then try talking to other characters!
